subject: NCAA Basketball Tournament
Basketball
Amateur Athletics
lead_paragraph: Richard Roby scored 8 of his 32 points in the second overtime Thursday and Colorado hurt Baylor’s N.C.A.A. tournament hopes with a 91-84 victory in the first round of the Big 12 Conference tournament in Kansas City, Mo.
snippet: Richard Roby scored 8 of his 32 points in the second overtime Thursday and Colorado hurt Baylor’s N.C.A.A. tournament hopes with a 91-84 victory in the first round of the Big 12 Conference tournament in Kansas City, Mo.
